item.title: RIVERA Initiatives Inc. establishes branch OMICS to focus on building a molecular biology innovation and commercialization platform for academic trainees.
item.dc:creator: RIVERA Initiatives Inc.
item.dc:subject: news
item.content:encoded: San Juan, Puerto Rico — In a strategic move to propel molecular biology training and innovation, RIVERA Initiatives Inc. proudly introduces RIVERA-OMICS (Omics Molecular Innovations and Commercialization Strategies), a cutting-edge academic initiative dedicated to advancing the frontiers of molecular biology with a specific emphasis on 'omics' technologies, including genomics, proteomics, and metabolomics.

item.title: RIVERA Initiatives Inc. completes registration in Puerto Rico Department of State aiming to become a leading resource initiative for academic enhancement.
item.dc:creator: RIVERA Initiatives Inc.
item.dc:subject: news
item.content:encoded: San Juan, Puerto Rico — In a significant stride towards advancing educational excellence and innovation, RIVERA Initiatives Inc. proudly announces the successful completion of its registration with the Puerto Rico Department of State. The non-profit organization, officially known as Resource Initiative for Venturous Education and Research in Academia (RIVERA), is set to become a leading force in fostering academic enhancement on a global scale.
